ability.name: Hit Me
ability.description: * Any time you take Damage, (even if offset with your Shield), you may say "Hit Me" to the GM. * Draw a card from the deck. * If it's a Minor Arcana, play it face-down on Blackjack. * If it's The Tower, take 1 Corruption Point _and_ discard all cards on Blackjack. * If it's a Major Arcana, discard it without playing it.
ability.flavor: Every time you take a hit, you're just one step closer to the jackpot.
